trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"> </xref> 라우트된 이벤트를와 연결 된 관련으로 미리 보기 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: This event data class is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> This event data class is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트 데이터 클래스는 다음 연결 된 이벤트와 함께 사용:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>이 이벤트 데이터 클래스는 기본 요소에서 다음과 같은 라우트된 이벤트에 사용할 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 일반 요소 모델에 쉽게 액세스할 수 있도록 앞에 나열 된 연결 된 이벤트를 전달 하는 이러한 라우트된 이벤트의 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>연결 된 이벤트와 기본 요소의 라우트된 이벤트의 이벤트 데이터를 공유 하 고 버블링 터널링 라우트된 이벤트의 버전 및 이벤트 데이터를 공유할 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: 이 경로 따라 이동할 때 이벤트의 처리 된 특성에 영향을 줄 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [입력 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> event is handled (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> is set to `true` in the event data), keyboard focus will not change.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>이벤트 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>이벤트를 처리 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> 로 설정 된 `true` 이벤트 데이터에서), 키보드 포커스 변경 되지 것입니다.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> event is handled, keyboard focus will not change.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>이벤트 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>이벤트를 처리, 키보드 포커스 변경 되지 것입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The logical keyboard device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트와 연결 된 논리 키보드 장치입니다.

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: 입력이 발생 한 시간입니다.

trans-unit.source: The element that previously had focus.
trans-unit.target: 이전에 포커스를 가진 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The element that now has focus.
trans-unit.target: 요소에 포커스가 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 시스템 효율성을 높일 수 있는 형식별 방법으로 이벤트 처리기를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현와으로 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>다음 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> 제네릭 처리기 캐스팅

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 패턴 및는 이유에 대 한 내용은 참조 하십시오. <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>및 [라우트된 이벤트 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: 제네릭 처리기 유형별 방식에서으로 호출입니다.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: 대상 처리기가 호출입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that focus has moved to.
trans-unit.target: 포커스를 하는 요소를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The element with focus.
trans-unit.target: 포커스가 있는 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that previously had focus.
trans-unit.target: 이전에 포커스를 가진 요소를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The previously focused element.
trans-unit.target: 이전에 포커스가 있는 요소입니다.
